content:
DataGridColumnHeaderItemAutomationPeer Class

Definition

Exposes the stem.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn.Header* of a DataGridColumn that is in a DataGrid to UI Automation.

In this Article

public class DataGridColumnHeaderItemAutomationPeer : System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer, System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IInvokeProvider, System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IScrollItemProvider, System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ITransformProvider, System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IVirtualizedItemProvider

Constructors

DataGridColumnHeaderItemAutomationPeer(Object,DataGridColumn,DataGridColumnHeadersPresenterAutomationPeer)

Initializes a new instance of the DataGridColumnHeaderItemAutomationPeer class.

public DataGridColumnHeaderItemAutomationPeer (object item, System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn column, System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DataGridColumnHeadersPresenterAutomationPeer peer);
item
Object

The stem.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn.Header* in the DataGridColumn that is associated with this DataGridColumnHeaderItemAutomationPeer.

column
DataGridColumn

The column that is associated with the stem.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn.Header*.

peer
DataGridColumnHeadersPresenterAutomationPeer

The automation peer for the DataGridColumnHeadersPresenter that is associated with the DataGrid.

Methods

GetAutomationControlTypeCore()

Gets the control type for the header that is associated with this DataGridColumnHeaderItemAutomationPeer. This method is called by stem.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationControlType*.

protected override System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationControlType GetAutomationControlTypeCore ();
Returns
AutomationControlType

The AutomationControlType enumeration value.

GetClassNameCore()

Gets a name that differentiates the header that is represented by this DataGridColumnHeaderItemAutomationPeer. This method is called by stem.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClassName*.

protected override string GetClassNameCore ();
Returns
String

The type name of the stem.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn.Header* property that is associated with this DataGridColumnHeaderItemAutomationPeer.

GetPattern(PatternInterface)

Returns the object that supports the specified control pattern of the element that is associated with this automation peer.

public override object GetPattern (System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface patternInterface);
patternInterface
PatternInterface

An enumeration value that specifies the control pattern.

Returns
Object

The current DataGridColumnHeaderItemAutomationPeer object, if patternInterface is a supported value; otherwise, null. For more information, see Remarks.

Remarks

If one of the following cases occurs, this method returns the current DataGridColumnHeaderItemAutomationPeer object:

  • patternInterface is System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface and the DataGridColumn object that is associated with this DataGridColumnHeaderItemAutomationPeer can be sorted.

  • patternInterface is System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface and the DataGridColumn object that is associated with this DataGridColumnHeaderItemAutomationPeer can be resized by the user.

  • patternInterface is System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.

  • patternInterface is System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.

IsContentElementCore()

Gets a value that indicates whether the element that is associated with this automation peer contains data that is presented to the user.

protected override bool IsContentElementCore ();
Returns
Boolean

false in all cases.

Sends a request to activate a control and initiate its single, unambiguous action.

void IInvokeProvider.Invoke ();

This member is an explicit interface member implementation. It can be used only when the DataGridColumnHeaderItemAutomationPeer instance is cast to an IInvokeProvider interface.

ITransformProvider.Move(Double,Double)

Throws an exception in all cases.

void ITransformProvider.Move (double x, double y);
x
Double

This parameter is not used.

y
Double

This parameter is not used.

Exceptions
InvalidOperationException

In all cases.

Remarks

The column that is associated with this DataGridColumnHeaderItemAutomationPeer cannot be moved.

Makes the virtual column fully accessible as a UI Automation element.
